casebody.data:
THERMACOR PROCESS, L.P., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. ROVANCO PIPING SYSTEMS, INC., Defendant-Appellee, and Lawrence J. Stonitsch, Defendant-Appellee. No. 01-1635. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 31, 2002.

ON MOTION

ORDER

Rovanco Piping Systems, Inc. and Lawrence J. Stonitsch move without opposition to dismiss Thermacor Process, L.P.’s appeal.

Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED THAT:

(1) The unopposed motion to dismiss is granted.

(2) All sides shall bear their own costs.
